snippet.title: PROJECT QUARANTINE - #13 - Audio Overhaul
snippet.description:
Hey guys,

Enjoy the ride on an in-depth look into our newly overhauled audio system in our latest DEV LOG, featuring the process behind how we create weapon sounds to how the sounds blend over distance.

We are using enhanced techniques, such as spatial audio and accurate room acoustics to serve realism in tandem with playability. As a small bonus, the background score is the very first in-house produced music for PROJECT QUARANTINE!

Big shout-out this time to our sound designer! 🔥

Keep in mind, that everything is still work-in-progress, and many aspects of the game are subject to change.

If you have any feedback, please let us know in the comments or on our Discord server: https://discord.gg/85wr66fqQq

00:00 Intro
00:05 Gunshot Sounds
01:10 Suppressed Gunshots
01:22 Gunshot Distance Blend 
02:02 Indoor Reverb System
02:23 Outro
